name: OriJump
description:
Jump and bounce your way to victory. 

Use the arrows to slide through the floor and the space bar to jump in the direction you're aiming, while bouncing in the little yellow-green thingies in this clunky-movement-old-school-style little game!

This game was made to a gamejam that is also, a college project. Other entries of this jam can be found here.
The characters and scenary sprites are made by  ansimuz.
The music is made by  nicolemariet.
The music is made by  LittleRobotSoundFactory.
